sqlMap.sql: SELECT ID, COMPANY_ID, IMAGE_SRC, BUTTON_IMAGE FROM VOUCHER_TEMP WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And ID=:id </#if> <#if companyId?exists && companyId!=""> And COMPANY_ID=:companyId </#if> <#if imageSrc?exists && imageSrc!=""> And IMAGE_SRC=:imageSrc </#if> <#if buttonImage?exists && buttonImage!=""> And BUTTON_IMAGE=:buttonImage </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO VOUCHER_TEMP (ID, COMPANY_ID, IMAGE_SRC, BUTTON_IMAGE) VALUES ( :id, :companyId, :imageSrc, :buttonImage)
UPDATE VOUCHER_TEMP SET COMPANY_ID = :companyId, IMAGE_SRC = :imageSrc, BUTTON_IMAGE = :buttonImage WHERE ID = :id
